Traits.Name: Evasive Movement
Traits.Content: Ball Lightning can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 1d10 force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

Traits.Name: Explosive Presence
Traits.Content: If Ball Lightning drops to 0 hit points, it explodes in a 10-foot radius, dealing 3d6 lightning damage to all creatures in that area (DC 13 Dexterity saving throw for half damage).

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Ball Lightning makes two attacks with its Lightning Snap.

Actions.Name: Lightning Snap
Actions.Content: Ranged Spell Attack: +4 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (3d6) lightning damage and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or become stunned until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Electric Surge
Actions.Content: The Ball Lightning releases a burst of electricity in a 15-foot radius. Each creature in that area must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 12 (3d8 + 1) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Additionally, creatures that fail the save are pushed 10 feet away from the Ball Lightning.
